subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fredy Montero had two goals and an assist, and the expansion Seattle Sounders F.C. looked like a seasoned team in their inaugural game with a convincing 3-0 victory over the visiting Red Bulls to begin the 14th season of Major League Soccer. red bulls.
